Name: Heather Crowe
Instructions: DRY SHAKE all ingredients and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into small jar. Special ingredient #1 : Benriach (peated) single malt Scotch whisky Special ingredient #2 : Heather ale syrup (1:1 ratio)
History: Created in 2016 by Elias Olaria Vives at Rye & Soda, Aberdeen for Jack Danielâ€™s Tennessee Calling competition.
Garnish: Smoke the drink with applewood and seal jar. Open jar when serving to guest.
